channel.title: Tormented Demons drops wont work
channel.description:
Hey what's up guys, I've been fixing every drop in my server and it all works except for the Tormented Demons drops. I've tried it with several NPC-ID's for the Tormented Demons and I've even putten my Bandos drops with a Tormented Demon ID but they just wont drop it :O! Maybe there is just ONE ID there can be used to let them drop it?
My codes (with the bandos item ID's atm but I don't think that should be a problem)
[code=java]#tormented demons 8362:25 1275:1 1275:1 3052:50 11726:1 3052:50 561:1000 561:1000 561:1000 995:10000000 1275:1 11724:1 1127:1 995:75000 1127:1 11704:1 1127:1 1127:1 1127:1 1127:1 3052:50 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 3052:50 1275:1 3052:50 11704:1 3052:50 1275:1 454:150 3052:50 11712:1 11728:1 11714:1 11724:1 11704:1 11710:1 989:1[/code]
Any suggestions?

item.title: Tormented Demons drops wont work
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

Hey what’s up guys, I’ve been fixing every drop in my server and it all works except for the Tormented Demons drops. I’ve tried it with several NPC-ID’s for the Tormented Demons and I’ve even putten my Bandos drops with a Tormented Demon ID but they just wont drop it :O! Maybe there is just ONE ID there can be used to let them drop it?

My codes (with the bandos item ID’s atm but I don’t think that should be a problem)

#tormented demons 8362:25 1275:1 1275:1 3052:50 11726:1 3052:50 561:1000 561:1000 561:1000 995:10000000 1275:1 11724:1 1127:1 995:75000 1127:1 11704:1 1127:1 1127:1 1127:1 1127:1 3052:50 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 3052:50 1275:1 3052:50 11704:1 3052:50 1275:1 454:150 3052:50 11712:1 11728:1 11714:1 11724:1 11704:1 11710:1 989:1
